title: Finite intervals of integers - misc additions

blocks.name: uzssico
blocks.content: Upper integer sets are a subset of the corresponding closed-below, open-above intervals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzssico(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wss(cfv(cuz, c0), co(c0, cico, cpnf)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c0, cico, cpnf), wcel(c0, cz))
  3imtr4d(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))))
  anim1d(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cz, cr)
  zssre()
  eluz1(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c0)
  elicopnf(c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cz))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uzssico(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ →(ℤ≥ ` c0)⊆(c0[[,)]+∞))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), (c0[[,)]+∞), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  3imtr4d(c0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), hs0 ∈(c0[[,)]+∞), (hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c0[≤]hs0), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]hs0))
  anim1d(c0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0[≤]hs0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℤ, (hs0 ∈ ℤ → hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  sseli(hs0, cz, cr)
  zssre()
  eluz1(c0, hs0)
  syl(c0 ∈ ℤ, (hs0 ∈(c0[[,)]+∞)↔(hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]hs0)), c0 ∈ ℝ)
  zre(c0)
  elicopnf(c0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[[,)]+∞))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ ℤ)
}

blocks.name: ssnnssfz
blocks.content: For any finite subset of ` NN ` , find a superset in the form of a set of sequential integers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssnnssfz(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wrex(s0, cn, wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wrex(s0, cn, wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, cn, wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wcel(nat1, cn), wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, nat1)))
  1nn()
  syl6eqss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, nat1), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  0ss(co(nat1, cfz, nat1))
  rspcev(s0, nat1, cn, wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, nat1)), wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))))
  sseq2d(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(s0), nat1, nat1, cfz)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, cn, wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wcel(csup(c0, cn, clt), cn), wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, csup(c0, cn, clt))))
  sseldd(csup(c0, cn, clt), cn, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, co(nat1, cfz, csup(c0, cn, clt)), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, csup(c0, cn, clt))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, csup(c0, cn, clt))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat1)), wcel(csup(c0, cn, clt), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat1), cn, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nnuz()
  syl3anbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csup(c0, cn, clt), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(csup(c0, cn, clt), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c0, cn, clt)))
  nnzd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nnzd(csup(c0, cn, clt), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c0, cn, clt)), wn(wbr(csup(c0, cn, clt), clt, cv(hs0))))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(csup(c0, cn, clt), clt, cv(hs0))))
  supub(hs0, hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), c0, cn, clt, wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  sylc(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(hs0, cn, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cn, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))))), wss(c0, cn), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cn, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cn, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))))), wor(clt, cn), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c0, cn))
  fisup2g(hs0, hs1, hs2, clt, cn, c0)
  ssrexv(hs0, c0, cn, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cn, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))))))
  lenltd(cv(hs0), csup(c0, cn, clt), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  nnred(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  nnred(csup(c0, cn, clt), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sseldd(csup(c0, cn, clt), cn, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, cn))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csup(c0, cn, clt), c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(csup(c0, cn, clt), c0), wor(clt, cn), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c0, cn))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wor(clt, cn))
  mp2(wor(clt, cn), wss(cn, cr), wor(clt, cr))
  nnssre()
  ltso()
  soss(cn, cr, clt)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cfn))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cpw(cn)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  elpwid(c0, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cpw(cn)))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cin(cpw(cn), cfn)), wcel(c0, cpw(cn)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  elin(c0, cpw(cn), cfn)
  fisupcl(clt, cn, c0)
  eluz2(csup(c0, cn, clt), cv(hs0))

  rspcev(s0, csup(c0, cn, clt), cn, wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, csup(c0, cn, clt))), wss(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))))
  sseq2d(c0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cfz, csup(c0, cn, clt)), wceq(cv(s0), csup(c0, cn, clt)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), csup(c0, cn, clt), nat1, cfz)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, co(nat1, cfz, nat1))

thm ssnnssfz(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(P(ℕ)⋂ Fin)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ⊆(1[...]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, c0 ∈(P(ℕ)⋂ Fin), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ⊆(1[...]s0)))
  sylancr((c0 ∈(P(ℕ)⋂ Fin)∧ c0 = ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ⊆(1[...]s0)), 1 ∈ ℕ, c0 ⊆(1[...]1))
  1nn()
  syl6eqss(c0, (1[...]1), emptycls, (c0 ∈(P(ℕ)⋂ Fin)∧ c0 = ∅))
  simpr(c0 ∈(P(ℕ)⋂ Fin), c0 = ∅)
  0ss((1[...]1))
  rspcev(s0, nat1, cn, c0 ⊆(1[...]1), c0 ⊆(1[...]s0))
  sseq2d(c0, (1[...]s0), (1[...]1), s0 = 1)
  oveq2(s0, nat1, nat1, cfz)
